search_results.snippet:
The Dymaxion map or Fuller map is a projection of a world map onto the surface 
of an icosahedron, which can be unfolded and flattened to two dimensions. The 
flat map is heavily interrupted in order to preserve shapes and sizes. The 
projection was invented by Buckminster Fuller. ... More unusually, the Dymaxion 
map does not have any "right way up".
